```{r echo=TRUE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(SCEVAN)

load("./HNSCC26_data.RData")

compareClonalStructure(count_mtx1 = count_mtx_prim, count_mtx2 = count_mtx_lymph, samp_1 = "HNSCC26_prim", samp_2 = "HNSCC26_lymph", par_cores = 20)

```
